topics.body:
So here's some good news coming from me: _I just the call from my college's theatre, and they want me to come in for an interview for that concessions job I applied for a couple of weeks ago._

I told them I was available for an early interview, so I'll be going in next Tuesday.

_If the interview goes well, and they hire me, I'll be able to start training and working right away, and finally have my first job ever! This is a pretty HUGE deal for me right now!_
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
